He <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> so that <S%H310>after<s%> him was none like him among all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> nor among them that were before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H3318>him;<s%> wherever he went forth he <S%H7919>prospered:<s%> and he <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and <S%H5647>didn't<s%> serve him.

At that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> cut <S%H7112>off<s%> the gold from the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and from the <S%H547>pillars<s%> which <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had <S%H6823>overlaid,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>

You <S%H559>say<s%> (but they are but <S%H8193>vain<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%>), <S%H6098><s%> 'There is counsel and <S%H1369>strength<s%> for <S%H4421>war.<s%>' Now on whom do you <S%H982>trust,<s%> that you have rebelled against <S%H4775>me?<s%>

<S%H982>Now,<s%> behold, you trust in the <S%H4938>staff<s%> of this <S%H7533>bruised<s%> <S%H7070>reed,<s%> even in <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> If a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5564>leans<s%> on <S%H935>it,<s%> it will go into his <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and <S%H5344>pierce<s%> <S%H6547>it.<s%> So is Pharaoh <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to all who trust on <S%H982>him.<s%>

<S%H8085>Don't<s%> listen to <S%H2396>Hezekiah.<s%>' For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> <S%H6213><s%> 'Make your <S%H1293>peace<s%> with <S%H3318>me,<s%> and come out to <S%H376>me;<s%> and everyone of you <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and <S%H376>everyone<s%> of his fig <S%H8384>tree,<s%> and <S%H376>everyone<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of his own <S%H953>cistern;<s%>

until I <S%H935>come<s%> and take you <S%H3947>away<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> like your own <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1715>grain<s%> and new <S%H8492>wine,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H3323>trees<s%> and of <S%H1706>honey,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live,<s%> and not <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H8085>Don't<s%> listen to <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> when he <S%H5496>persuades<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> will deliver <S%H5337>us.<s%>"
